scripts.dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/vk-add-fonts-for-block-editor && rsync -av --progress --exclude dist/ ./ dist/vk-add-fonts-for-block-editor/ && npm run delete-files
scripts.delete-files: rm -rf dist/vk-add-fonts-for-block-editor/.github && rm -rf dist/vk-add-fonts-for-block-editor/.git && rm -rf dist/vk-add-fonts-for-block-editor/dist && find dist/vk-add-fonts-for-block-editor/ -maxdepth 1 -type f ! \( -name '*.txt' -o -name '*.php' \) -exec rm {} \;
scripts.zip: npm run dist && cd dist/vk-add-fonts-for-block-editor && zip -r ../vk-add-fonts-for-block-editor.zip .
